summary: In the year 1637 in Shimabara of Tokugawa-era Japan, oppressed peasant Christians revolt against the shogunate with the aid of a charismatic Christian rebel leader Shiro Amakusa.
cast: Hashizô Ôkawa|Ryûtarô Ôtomo|Satomi Oka|Rentarô Mikuni|Junko Matsukawa|Chôichirô Kawarasaki|Minoru Chiaki|Yoshi Katô|Tokue Hanazawa|Takamaru Sasaki|Mikijirô Hira|Kei Satô|Rokkô Toura|Tetsuo Ashida|Sue Mitobe|Kikue Môri
title: Amakusa Shirô Tokisada
